summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 15, 2019. It details routine institutional operations, staff leave, overtime, inmate counts, and notes that inmate #79792-007 (Jeffrey Epstein) was on Psychological Observation with an inmate companion. The report was created the day after Epstein's arrest and the day before his death.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein, listed as inmate #79792-007, was on Psychological Observation (Psych Obs.) with an inmate companion on July 15, 2019.
The document is a routine daily activity report from the MCC New York, created on July 16, 2019, detailing the previous day's operations.
The report notes a broken sprinkler head in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and various staff shortages.
Inmate Burnett (#76254-054) was reported to be at a local hospice under guard by the U.S. Marshals Service (USMS).
The total inmate population at the beginning of the morning watch on July 15, 2019, was 798.
